002
003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpentityextraction.xml.definition;
004
005import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlRootElement;
006
007import edu.stanford.nlp.patterns.GetPatternsFromDataMultiClass;
008import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.xml.definition.AbstractProcessingStepParameter;
009
010/**
011 * Parameter for specifying the directory where the seed words files for
012 * {@link GetPatternsFromDataMultiClass} will be found.
013 * <p>
014 * The step will scan the provided file name (normally, a directory) for files
015 * with "tsv" extension, and interpret their name (without the extension) as a
016 * named entity label or type. The TSV files found must contain two columns,
017 * "term" and "synonyms", where the first column enumerates terms, and the
018 * second column the synonyms for every term (if there are no synonyms, it can
019 * be empty or missing).
020 * <p>
021 * The results of this operation will be used to generate a value for the
022 * {@code seedWordsFiles} property used by
023 * {@link GetPatternsFromDataMultiClass}.
024 *
025 * @author Alejandro González García
026 */
027@XmlRootElement(name = "seedWordsFilesDirectory")
028public final class SeedWordsDirectoryProcessingStepParameter extends AbstractProcessingStepParameter {}
